title: ECommerce Monstera Store Inspiration
description: My case study prototype project in Google where I learned about entry-level jobs in user experience (UX) design.

title: Skin Disease Identification through Image Classification and Segmentation using Deep Learning Technique
description: A cross-platform application that utilizes machine learning techniques to detect viral skin lesion diseases. The aim of this project is to reduce the cases of skin lesion diseases. For the model processing, we studied and utilized a convolutional neural network named for detecting skin cancer diseases
